summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the supervised fine‑tuning trainer across a broad spectrum of configurations, including PEFT adapters, various model specifications, multi‑process execution, gradient checkpointing, device‑map handling, QLoRA quantization, chat‑format data, and Liger extensions.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the supervised fine‑tuning workflow for developers and end‑users, ensuring that the trainer functions reliably under diverse hardware setups, model adaptations, and optimization techniques.
